\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: When you create a new project, Game Studio creates an initial scene and populates it with basic entities such as a light, a camera, and a skybox.
Quando você cria um novo projeto, o Game Studio cria uma cena inicial e o popula com entidades básicas, como uma luz, uma câmera e um skybox.
When you create a new project, Game Studio creates an initial scene and populates it with basic entities such as a light, a camera, and a skybox.
You can create scenes like any other asset.
Você pode criar cenas como qualquer outro ativo.
You can create scenes like any other asset.
As they are complex assets, they have a dedicated editor, the <g1>Scene Editor</g1>.
Como eles são ativos complexos, eles têm um editor dedicado, o <g1>Scene Editor</g1>.
As they are complex assets, they have a dedicated editor, the <g1>Scene Editor</g1>.
In the <g1>Asset View</g1> (by default in the bottom pane), click <g2>Add asset</g2> and select <g3>Scenes</g3>.
No <g1>Asset View</g1> (por padrão no painel inferior), clique em <g2>Add asset</g2> e selecione <g3>Scenes</g3>.
In the <g1>Asset View</g1> (by default in the bottom pane), click <g2>Add asset</g2> and select <g3>Scenes</g3>.
An empty scene with no entities or preconfigured rendering pipeline
Uma cena vazia sem entidades ou pipeline de renderização pré-configurado
An empty scene with no entities or preconfigured rendering pipeline
A scene containing basic entities and preconfigured for HDR rendering
Uma cena contendo entidades básicas e pré-configurada para renderização HDR
A scene containing basic entities and preconfigured for HDR rendering
A scene containing basic entities and preconfigured for LDR rendering
Uma cena contendo entidades básicas e pré-configurada para renderização LDR
A scene containing basic entities and preconfigured for LDR rendering
Open a scene in the Scene Editor
Abra uma cena no Editor de cenas
Open a scene in the Scene Editor
<x1/>Select a scene in the Asset View<x2/>
<x1/> Selecione uma cena no Asset View<x2/>
<x1/>Select a scene in the Asset View<x2/>
clique duas vezes no ativo da cena, ou
right-click the asset and select <g1>Edit asset</g1>, or
clique com o botão direito do mouse no ativo e selecione <g1>Editar asset</g1>, ou
right-click the asset and select <g1>Edit asset</g1>, or
select the asset and type <g1>Ctrl + Enter</g1>
selecione o ativo e digite <g1>Ctrl + Enter</g1>
select the asset and type <g1>Ctrl + Enter</g1>
You can have several scenes open simultaneously.
Você pode ter várias cenas abertas simultaneamente.
You can have several scenes open simultaneously.
The <g1>Scene Editor tabs</g1> (A) display the open scenes.
As guias <g1>Scene Editor</g1> (A) exibem as cenas abertas.
The <g1>Scene Editor tabs</g1> (A) display the open scenes.
You can switch between open scenes using the tabs.
Você pode alternar entre cenas abertas usando as abas.
You can switch between open scenes using the tabs.
The <g1>Entity Tree</g1> (B) shows the hierarchy of the entities included in the scene.
O <g1>Entity Tree</g1> (B) mostra a hierarquia das entidades incluídas na cena.
The <g1>Entity Tree</g1> (B) shows the hierarchy of the entities included in the scene.
The same entity hierarchy is applied at runtime.
A mesma hierarquia de entidades é aplicada em tempo de execução.
The same entity hierarchy is applied at runtime.
You can use the Entity Tree to browse, select, rename, and reorganize your entities.
Você pode usar o Entity Tree para navegar, selecionar, renomear e reorganizar suas entidades.
You can use the Entity Tree to browse, select, rename, and reorganize your entities.
You can use the <g1>tool bar</g1> (C) to modify entities and change the Scene Editor display.
Você pode usar o <g1>tool bar</g1> (C) para modificar entidades e alterar a exibição do Editor de cena.
You can use the <g1>tool bar</g1> (C) to modify entities and change the Scene Editor display.
The <g1>main window</g1> (D) shows a simplified representation of your scene, with your entities positioned inside it.
A janela <g1>main</g1> (D) mostra uma representação simplificada de sua cena, com suas entidades posicionadas dentro dela.
The <g1>main window</g1> (D) shows a simplified representation of your scene, with your entities positioned inside it.
For entities that have no shape (E), Game Studio represents them with <g2>2D gizmos</g2>; for example, cameras are represented with camera icons.
Para entidades que não têm forma (E), Game Studio os representa com <g2>2D gizmos</g2>; por exemplo, as câmeras são representadas com ícones da câmera.
For entities that have no shape (E), Game Studio represents them with <g2>2D gizmos</g2>; for example, cameras are represented with camera icons.
